    • Uses of CSSFormat in com.steadystate.css.format

      Methods in com.steadystate.css.format that return CSSFormat 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CSSFormat CSSFormat.setPropertiesInSeparateLines(int anIndent)
      If this value is larger than -1 the individual properties from a rule are rendered in separate lines; the parameter defines the indentation level.
